column1: In the present study, we used selective pharmacological inhibitors to investigate the roles of phosphatidylinositol - 3 ' - kinase ( PI3 - K), phospholipase C ( PLC), calcium - dependent protein kinase C ( PKC), extra - cellular signal regulated kinase ( ERK), and nuclear translocation factor kappa B ( NF - kappaB) on TLR2 - mediated oxidative burst.

column1: Furthermore, PGE ( 2), an EP2 agonist ( butaprost), an EP2 / PGE ( 3) ( EP3) / EP4 agonist ( misoprostol), and misoprostol in the presence of AH6809 all induced IL - 6 production, whereas an EP1 / EP3 agonist ( sulprostone) did not.
